category: "+curCatName(); } function writeQuestion() { ab.value = ""; tdQue.innerHTML = spaceOut(removeVowels(answers[que])); } function writeScore(b) { t = b ? "CORRECT!" : "WRONG!"; writeTheScore(t); } function writeTheScore(t) { tdSco.innerHTML = t + " Score: " + score1 + " / " + score2; } function writeAnswer(t) { ta.innerHTML = (t == null) ? "" : "Last Answer: " + t; } function lettersOnly(str) { if (str == null) return ""; return str.toUpperCase().replace(/[^a-zA-Z]/g,""); } function removeVowels(str) { s = lettersOnly(str); return s.replace(/[AEIOU]/gi, ''); } function spaceOut(str) { t = str.charAt(0); for (i=1; i<str.length; i++) { if (parseInt(Math.random()*4) == 0) t += " "; t += str.charAt(i); } return t; } function strEquals(s1, s2) { t1 = lettersOnly(s1); t2 = lettersOnly(s2); return (t1 == t2); } function result(t) { s = ""; if (t == 0) s = "Absolutely awful!"; else if (t <= 3) s = "Better study some more..."; else if (t <= 6) s = "Can you do better than this?"; else if (t <= 9) s = "Beginner's luck!"; else if (t <= 11) s = "You belong on Only Connect!"; else if (t == 12) s = "Perfection!!!"; return s; } function guess(fail) { if (over) return false; v1 = ab.value; if (fail) v1 = "X"; if (v1 == '') { alert("Please enter a response"); return false; } v2 = answers[que]; correct = strEquals(v1, v2); score2++; if (correct) score1++; writeScore(correct); writeAnswer(v2); que++; if (que == m) { que = 0; cur++; if (cur == q) { over = true; showDiv(null, "rr"); hideDiv(null, "rq"); writeTheScore(result(score1)); return false; } answers = curAnswers(); writeCategory(); } writeQuestion(); return false; } restart();
